turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like to place an order with a new pizza place called Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order three three medium pepperoni pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want pepperoni for all 3?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, and I would also like to get sausage on top, as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you are ordering 3 medium pepperoni and sausage pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, then I would also like them to be thick crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, your total will be $57, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: will you be dining in, picking up, or having your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pick up. I want to do pick up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your pizzas will be ready for pickup in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
